name: OcculTwins
description:
OcculTwins is a puzzle game, where two cultists try to escape from another dimension. They magically link together the friendly, but somewhat dim-witted, slime-demons they summoned to solve puzzles.

Goal

Get to the portals on each of the 8 levels. The orange cultist has to go on the orange portal and the blue cultist on the blue one.

Controls
  • W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys to move
  • Tab to switch between the two cultists
  • Space to link the slime-demons in front of the cultists
  • R to restart levels
